channel.title: NDTV News Search Records Found 1000
channel.description: NDTV.com provides the latest information from and in-depth coverage of India and the world. Find breaking news, India news, top stories, elections, politics, business, cricket, movies, lifestyle, health, live TV, videos, photos and more.

item.title: Intercepted Iranian Communications Downplay Damage From US Strikes: Report
item.description: Intercepted Iranian communications downplayed the extent of damage caused by U.S. strikes on Iran's nuclear program, the Washington Post reported on Sunday, citing four people familiar with classified intelligence circulating within the US government
item.content:encoded: Intercepted Iranian communications downplayed the extent of damage caused by U.S. strikes on Iran's nuclear program, the Washington Post reported on Sunday, citing four people familiar with classified intelligence circulating within the US government

item.title: "Like Absolute Butter": Trump On How US Struck Iran's Fordow Nuclear Site

media:content.media:description: Fordow was known as the country's most heavily nuclear protected site, hidden beneath a mountain.

item.description: Bombs dropped by American B-2 Stealth Fighter aircraft went through Iran's heavily-guarded Fordow nuclear facility "like butter", US President Donald Trump said.
item.content:encoded: Bombs dropped by American B-2 Stealth Fighter aircraft went through Iran's heavily-guarded Fordow nuclear facility "like butter", US President Donald Trump said.

item.title: Doctors Reveal Why 8-Year-Old In China Vomited Live Worms For A Month
item.description: The girl's symptoms included vomiting live larvae, approximately 1 centimetre long, indicating a severe infestation.
item.content:encoded: The girl's symptoms included vomiting live larvae, approximately 1 centimetre long, indicating a severe infestation.

item.title: How Democrats In America's Most Jewish City Embraced Israel Critic For New York Mayor
item.description: In choosing Zohran Mamdani as their candidate for mayor, Democrats in America's most Jewish city have nominated an outspoken critic of Israel, alarming some in New York's Jewish community.
item.content:encoded: In choosing Zohran Mamdani as their candidate for mayor, Democrats in America's most Jewish city have nominated an outspoken critic of Israel, alarming some in New York's Jewish community.

item.title: Pools And Slides As North Korea Set To Open 'World Class' Tourist Resort
item.description: North Korea has completed construction on a massive tourist resort boasting colourful water slides and swimming pools, a pet project of leader Kim Jong Un.
item.content:encoded: North Korea has completed construction on a massive tourist resort boasting colourful water slides and swimming pools, a pet project of leader Kim Jong Un.

item.title: Indian Negotiators Extend US Stay As Trade Talks Gather Pace: Report

media:content.media:description: US President Donald Trump last week said "a very big" deal with India was likely soon

item.description: India's trade team has extended its stay in Washington to iron out differences as the two sides look to clinch a deal before a July 9 deadline when higher US tariffs are set to kick in, people familiar with the matter said.
item.content:encoded: India's trade team has extended its stay in Washington to iron out differences as the two sides look to clinch a deal before a July 9 deadline when higher US tariffs are set to kick in, people familiar with the matter said.

item.title: "Ready To Respond": Iran's New Warning To Israel Over Ceasefire Breach

media:content.media:description: Iran has asked UN to recognise Israel and the US were responsible for war.

item.description: Iran has cast doubts on the durability of the US-brokered ceasefire with Israel, warning it is ready to respond if hostilities with the Jewish state resume.
item.content:encoded: Iran has cast doubts on the durability of the US-brokered ceasefire with Israel, warning it is ready to respond if hostilities with the Jewish state resume.

item.title: China Rolls Over $3.4 Billion Of Commercial Loans To Pakistan: Report
item.description: China has rolled over $3.4 billion in loans to Islamabad, which together with other recent commercial and multilateral lending will boost Pakistan's foreign exchange reserves to $14 billion, a finance ministry source said.
item.content:encoded: China has rolled over $3.4 billion in loans to Islamabad, which together with other recent commercial and multilateral lending will boost Pakistan's foreign exchange reserves to $14 billion, a finance ministry source said.

item.title: AI Is Learning To Lie, Scheme And Threaten Its Creators
item.description: The world's most advanced AI models are exhibiting troubling new behaviors - lying, scheming, and even threatening their creators to achieve their goals.
item.content:encoded: The world's most advanced AI models are exhibiting troubling new behaviors - lying, scheming, and even threatening their creators to achieve their goals.

item.title: Analysis: US Strikes On Iran's Nuke Sites Set Up "Cat-And-Mouse" Hunt For Missing Uranium

media:content.media:description: A satellite view shows an overview of Fordow underground complex, after the US strikes

item.description: The US and Israeli bombing of Iranian nuclear sites creates a conundrum for U.N. inspectors in Iran: how can you tell if enriched uranium stocks, some of them near weapons grade, were buried beneath the rubble or had been secretly hidden away?
item.content:encoded: The US and Israeli bombing of Iranian nuclear sites creates a conundrum for U.N. inspectors in Iran: how can you tell if enriched uranium stocks, some of them near weapons grade, were buried beneath the rubble or had been secretly hidden away?

item.title: "Severely Dehydrated" Newborn Baby Found Beside Dead Mother In Phoenix, Rescued
item.description: The Phoenix Police Department is investigating the mother's cause and manner of death.
item.content:encoded: The Phoenix Police Department is investigating the mother's cause and manner of death.

item.title: Five Arrested In Bangladesh For Raping Woman, Circulating Video

media:content.media:description: Legal action is being taken against the five individuals who were arrested, police said.

item.description: Bangladesh Police have arrested five people accused of raping a Hindu woman in a remote village of Comilla district and circulating her video on social media. A video that has gone viral on social media shows a naked woman pleading.
item.content:encoded: Bangladesh Police have arrested five people accused of raping a Hindu woman in a remote village of Comilla district and circulating her video on social media. A video that has gone viral on social media shows a naked woman pleading.

item.title: All About O-1 Visa, Entry Route To US Gaining Popularity Among Indians

media:content.media:description: O-1A issuances surged from 8,838 in FY2020 to 18,994 in FY2023

item.description: As Indians face challenges in getting a work visa in the United States due to long queues and the Trump administration's crackdown on immigration, the O-1 visa is emerging as an alternative for professionals seeking job opportunities in the US.
item.content:encoded: As Indians face challenges in getting a work visa in the United States due to long queues and the Trump administration's crackdown on immigration, the O-1 visa is emerging as an alternative for professionals seeking job opportunities in the US.

item.title: Hong Kong Opposition Party Disbands Citing 'Immense' Pressure
item.description: One of Hong Kong's last remaining opposition parties has officially disbanded, its leader announced, citing "immense political pressure" as Beijing presses on with its years-long crackdown on dissent.
item.content:encoded: One of Hong Kong's last remaining opposition parties has officially disbanded, its leader announced, citing "immense political pressure" as Beijing presses on with its years-long crackdown on dissent.

item.title: Germany Plans 'Cyber Dome', Seeks Israeli Partnership On Cyberdefence
item.description: Germany is aiming to establish a joint German-Israeli cyber research centre and deepen collaboration between the two countries' intelligence and security agencies, German Interior Minister Alexander Dobrindt said.
item.content:encoded: Germany is aiming to establish a joint German-Israeli cyber research centre and deepen collaboration between the two countries' intelligence and security agencies, German Interior Minister Alexander Dobrindt said.

item.title: Powerful Storm Forces Delta Air Lines To Pull Over 100 Aircraft For Inspection
item.description: The airline expects additional delays and cancellations as teams work to safely reset aircraft and reposition flight crews.
item.content:encoded: The airline expects additional delays and cancellations as teams work to safely reset aircraft and reposition flight crews.

item.title: Israeli PM Netanyahu's "Make Middle East Great Again" Call After Trump's Support On Corruption Trial

media:content.media:description: Trump said Netanyahu's corruption trial was a "political witch hunt".

item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu thanked US President Donald Trump for extending support over the corruption trial against him, as he pleaded to "make the Middle East great again" with the American leader.
item.content:encoded: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu thanked US President Donald Trump for extending support over the corruption trial against him, as he pleaded to "make the Middle East great again" with the American leader.

item.title: 477 Drones, 60 Missiles: Russia Launches "Biggest" Aerial Attack On Ukraine

media:content.media:description: Three multi-storey buildings and a college were damaged in the attack

item.description: Russia launched its biggest aerial attack against Ukraine overnight, wounding at least six people, including a child, according to Ukrainian officials.

item.title: 3 Earthquakes Hit Pakistan In 24 Hours, No Reports Of Major Damages

media:content.media:description: Shallow earthquakes are generally more dangerous than deep earthquakes.

item.description: Pakistan is one of the most seismically active countries in the world, being crossed by several major faults.
item.content:encoded: Pakistan is one of the most seismically active countries in the world, being crossed by several major faults.

item.title: Video Shows Tesla Driving Itself To New Owner's Home, Elon Musk Reacts

media:content.media:description: The Model Y parked itself under the owner's building at the end of the journey.

item.description: The footage showed the Model Y departing from the Gigafactory garage with no one in the driver's seat.
item.content:encoded: The footage showed the Model Y departing from the Gigafactory garage with no one in the driver's seat.
